name: 陳潔晞
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. The Mystery on Mount Everest
3. Practice and Review
4. Danger: Asteroids Ahead
5. Practice and Review
6. Midtern
7. Practice and Review
8. Bird Watching in Taiwan
9. Practice and Review
10. The Last Flight of the Concorde
11. Practice and Review
12. Final
materials: World Class Reading 1 A reading Skill Text  New York: Macgrow Hills, 2005
